snippet.title: The Executioner April 2019 Teaser
snippet.description:
The Executioner puts you in the shoes of a man who tortures people for a living while trying to retain his own sanity. In this game the monster isn’t lurking behind you. You are the monster, if you choose to become one. Coming July 2019. https://store.steampowered.com/app/739130/The_Executioner/

Lesser Evil Games is an independent game development studio. The team was assembled in 2016 around passion for games and their impact on society. Lesser Evil Games are focused on creation of games that give food for thought and that tackle subjects that are too "controversial" for mainstream.

Visit us at http://executionergame.com/
